Literature.Title: Designing Anticancer Peptides by Constructive Machine Learning.

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=112.5 µM,Human fibroblasts WI-38:LD50=8 µg/ml,Human leukocytes:LD50=64 µg/ml
